entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: E 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
